markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Mendicants, the arising of perception of sights … perception of thoughts … is the manifestation of old age and death. The cessation of perception of sights … perception of thoughts … is the ending of old age and death.”

SN.26.7. Sañcetanāsutta (“Intention”)
